summary: Avocados are tasty fruits that come from an evergreen tree. They were first grown in Mexico and Central America over 5,000 years ago. These fruits are special because they have a lot of oil and are big. Avocado trees can be found from Mexico to Costa Rica. The fruit is like a big berry with one big seed inside. Today, Mexico grows the most avocados, and they are sold all over the world. Avocados are healthy and often used in vegetarian meals. However, growing avocados uses a lot of water, which can cause problems in some places.
title: Avocado
